sakai:query-template: /{_userMessagePath}//element(*)MetaData[@sling:resourceType='sakai/message' and @sakai:type='notice' and @sakai:category='reminder' and @sakai:dueDate != '' and @sakai:dueDate >= xs:dateTime('{startDate}') and @sakai:dueDate <= xs:dateTime('{endDate}') and not(@sakai:archived) and @sakai:required != '{excludeRequiredState}' ] order by @{sortOn|jcr:dueDate} {sortOrder|ascending}
sakai:title: Messaging - User - Tasks.
sakai:shortDescription: Get all the tasks for a specified box and category.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "box", "description" : "The messagebox you want the notices for."}
{"name" : "category", "description" : "The category you want the notices filtered on."}
sakai:description: This search will dump all the tasks for the specified messagebox.
